overview: With his startlingly outrageous behavior, G.G. Allin became one of the most infamous performers in the history of rock and roll. G.G. Allin: Live & Pissed 1988 contains a collection of live performances, television appearances, and interviews that pain a full portrait of the controversial singer. The DVD release of the documentary contains a San Francisco concert appearance.
title: GG Allin: Live and Pissed
